pullrequest.title: Share vertices when loading a collada mesh, improve loader performance

content.raw:
I was digging into `cordless_drill.dae` to find out how come the vertices are not being shared and found out that the Collada file itself has repeated UV coordinates.

So maybe it could be interesting to look for repeated coordinates rather than indices...
content.html:
I was digging into cordless_drill.dae to find out how come the vertices are not being shared and found out that the Collada file itself has repeated UV coordinates.

So maybe it could be interesting to look for repeated coordinates rather than indices...
